title: New: Boy Friend – Egyptian Wrinkle
content:
This dreamy new track from Christa Palozzo and Sarah Brown aka Boy Friend is a fantastic slice of languid, sensual pop.

With Egyptian Wrinkle set to feature on their debut LP of the same title, due February next year, it’s a more openly pop inspired tune than previous project Sleep ∞ Over, but isn’t too much of a departure. There’s the shoegaze influenced vocals and the deep rooted sense of longing and lust, all tied up by the seductive vocals of Palozzolo and Brown’s omnipresent echoed guitar. Check out Egyptian Wrinkle below, and keep an ear out for their debut LP out next year on Hell, Yes Records.

Egyptian Wrinkle by Boy Friend
